00031 #define USE_SAME_KNOWLEDGE

00034 const unsigned int NUM_THREADS = 10;
00035 int done[NUM_THREADS];
00036 
00037 struct pthread_t_data{
00038         unsigned int thread_id;
00039         string input_filename;
00040         string output_filename;
00041         Analyzer* analyzer;
00042 };
00043 
00044 
00045 void* analyzerWithThread(void* threadarg)       {
00046         pthread_t_data* data;
00047         data = (struct pthread_t_data*)threadarg;
00048         Analyzer* _analyzer = data->analyzer;
00049         done[data->thread_id] = 0;
00050         
00051         ostringstream ss;
00052         ss << data->thread_id;
00053         string source = data->input_filename;
00054         string dest = data->output_filename +  ".output-" + ss.str();
00055         
00056         cerr << "########## Thread No." << data->thread_id << " => test method runWithStream()" << endl;
00057         cerr << "##### input file: " << source << endl;
00058         cerr << "##### output file: " << dest << endl;
00059 
00060 
00061         int result = _analyzer->runWithStream(source.c_str(), dest.c_str());
00062         if(result == 1)
00063         {
00064                 cerr << "Thread No." << data->thread_id << "=> succeed in runWithStream() from " << source << " to " << dest << endl;
00065         }
00066         else
00067         {
00068                 cerr << "Thread No." << data->thread_id << "=> fail in runWithStream() from " << source << " to " << dest << endl;
00069         }
00070         
00071         done[data->thread_id] = 1;
00072 
00073         pthread_exit(NULL);
00074 }

00079 void printUsage()

00081     cerr << "Usages:\t raw_file [result_file]" << endl;
00082     cerr << "if result_file is not given, it would be raw_file.output-* defaultly." << endl;
00083 }

00088 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00089 {
00090         cerr << "Japanese Morphological Analyzer Multi-Thread Test, " << __DATE__ << " " << __TIME__ << endl;
00091         
00092         if(argc < 2)
00093         {
00094                 printUsage();
00095                 exit(1);
00096         }
00097 
00098         // create instances
00099         JMA_Factory* factory = JMA_Factory::instance();
00100 
00101     // set default dictionary file
00102     const char* sysdict = TEST_JMA_DEFAULT_SYSTEM_DICT;
00103 
00104     // set encoding type from the dictionary path
00105         string sysdictStr(sysdict);
00106         size_t first = sysdictStr.find_last_of('_');
00107         size_t last = sysdictStr.find_last_not_of('/');
00108         string encodeStr = sysdictStr.substr(first+1, last-first);
00109         Knowledge::EncodeType encode = Knowledge::decodeEncodeType(encodeStr.c_str());
00110         
00111 #ifdef USE_SAME_KNOWLEDGE
00112         // create instances
00113         Knowledge* knowledge = factory->createKnowledge();
00114         knowledge->setSystemDict(sysdict);
00115         if(knowledge->loadDict() == 0)
00116         {
00117                 cerr << "fail to load dictionary files "<< sysdict << endl;
00118                 exit(1);
00119         }
00120 
00121         if(encode != Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_NUM)
00122                 knowledge->setEncodeType(encode);
00123 #endif
00124 
00125 #ifdef USE_SAME_ANALYZER
00126         Analyzer *analyzer = factory->createAnalyzer();
00127         analyzer->setOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_POS_TAGGING, 0);
00128         analyzer->setKnowledge(knowledge);
00129 #endif
00130 
00131         // multi-thread test
00132         int rc;
00133         unsigned int tid = 0;
00134         
00135         pthread_t threads[NUM_THREADS];
00136         pthread_t_data thread_data[NUM_THREADS];
00137         
00138     // file name of input and output
00139     string input = argv[1];
00140     string output;
00141     if(argc < 3)
00142     {
00143         output = input;
00144     }
00145     else
00146     {
00147         output = argv[2];
00148     }
00149 
00150         while(tid < NUM_THREADS)        {
00151                 thread_data[tid].thread_id = tid;
00152                 thread_data[tid].input_filename = input;
00153                 thread_data[tid].output_filename = output;
00154 
00155         #ifndef USE_SAME_KNOWLEDGE
00156                 Knowledge* knowledge = factory->createKnowledge();
00157                 knowledge->setSystemDict(sysdict);
00158                 if(knowledge->loadDict() == 0)
00159                 {
00160                         cerr << "fail to load dictionary files "<< sysdict << endl;
00161                         exit(1);
00162                 }
00163 
00164                 if(encode != Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_NUM)
00165                         knowledge->setEncodeType(encode);
00166         #endif
00167 
00168         #ifdef USE_SAME_ANALYZER
00169                 thread_data[tid].analyzer = analyzer;
00170         #else
00171                 thread_data[tid].analyzer = factory->createAnalyzer();
00172                 thread_data[tid].analyzer->setOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_POS_TAGGING, 0);
00173                 thread_data[tid].analyzer->setKnowledge(knowledge);
00174         #endif
00175 
00176                 rc = pthread_create(&threads[tid], NULL, analyzerWithThread, (void *) &thread_data[tid]);
00177                 if (rc){
00178                         printf("ERROR; return code from pthread_create() is %d\n", rc);
00179                         exit(-1);
00180                 }
00181 
00182                 ++tid;
00183         }
00184         
00185         while(true)     {
00186                 unsigned int _done = 0;
00187                 for(unsigned int i = 0; i < NUM_THREADS; i++)   {
00188                         _done += done[i];
00189                 }
00190                 
00191                 //cout<<"Progress: "<<_done<<"/"<<NUM_THREADS<<endl;
00192 
00193                 if(_done == NUM_THREADS)        {
00194                         break;
00195                 }
00196         }
00197         
00198         // destroy instances
00199 #ifdef USE_SAME_KNOWLEDGE
00200         delete knowledge;
00201 #endif
00202 
00203 #ifdef USE_SAME_ANALYZER
00204         delete analyzer;
00205 #endif
00206 
00207         pthread_exit(NULL);
00208 }
